text: Gordon Spice (18 April 1940 â€“ 10 September 2021) was a British racing driver. He competed in both sports cars and Touring Car racing in the 1960s and 1970s. An engineer, he also created the company Spice Engineering, where he designed and built cars. He was born in London. Spice died of cancer on 10 September 2021 in London, aged 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British racecar drivers Category:British mechanical engineers Category:Sportspeople from London Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Gordon Spice
